bugs.summary: Use #ifdef in a file to declare shortcut keys in dom/xbl/builtin instead of using ShortcutKeyDefinitions.cpp per platform
Remove obsolete Fennec special case for nsDeckFrame
Missing glyph atlas image keys incorrectly used
Discard invalid resource update transactions due to namespace changes
Move SWGL compositor into WebRender proper.
Use cheaper approximations for WR shader anti-aliasing
Add composite surface locking to MappableCompositor trait.
getElementBoundingRect in BrowserUtils.jsm should convert the element rect by using BrowserChild's mChildToParentConversionMatrix
Better handle hit-testing when inactive scrollframes intersect OOPIFs
Simplify structures and naming related to directory metadata
pdf viewer should not fire the load event until it's ready for printing
